question: Identify the social media engagement metrics of companies in the technology industry.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Filter companies based on the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Gather Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for the identified companies from the CompanyFacebookDetail table.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Retrieve Instagram engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rate) from the CompanyInstagramDetail table for the same companies.","table":["CompanyInstagramDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Collect Twitter engagement metrics (likes, retweets) from the CompanyTwitterDetail table for the identified companies.","table":["CompanyTwitterDetail"]},{"step":5,"task":"Combine all social media engagement metrics into a single report for analysis and presentation.","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail"]}]}
